divs: sighting detailsmy sister carmen woke me up at 5:10 telling me that she saw the same lights we saw on 8\1\10 over walnut and 55 fwy, again! she got to video tape about 3 seconds of the light before it dissapeared (out first video of the light is a lot longer) it glowed slowly purple, red, blue and white lights.. and it seemed to be heading north again.
